app.name: Treasure Hunt
app.description: A global location-based game where you find hidden circles on maps, complete challenges and compete with your team.

login.title: Welcome
login.subtitle: Enter your credentials to access your account
login.error_recaptcha: reCAPTCHA not loaded. Please refresh the page.
login.error_connection: Unable to connect to server. Please check if the backend is running.
login.error_generic: An error has occurred. Please try again later.

register.title: Create
register.subtitle: Join us to access all features
register.password_hint: At least 8 characters, one letter, one number, one special character.
register.error_invalid_code: The registration code is invalid. Please check the code and try again.
register.error_fill_fields: Please fill in all fields correctly.

forgot_password.subtitle: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
forgot_password.status_message2: If an account with that email exists, a password reset link has been sent.

reset_password.title: Reset Password
reset_password.subtitle: Enter your new password
reset_password.success: Password reset successful! Redirecting to login...

map.latitudeMustBeValid: Latitude must be a valid number
map.longitudeMustBeValid: Longitude must be a valid number

mapClear.title1: Do you want to clear the map?
mapClear.title2: Do you want to remove all circles and markers from the map?
mapClear.danger: Danger: This action cannot be undone.

location.support_disabled: Geolocation is not supported by your browser.
location.denied: Location access denied. Please enable it in settings to use this feature.
location.unavailable: GPS position unavailable. Try turning on location services or moving to a location with better signal.
location.timeout: Location request timed out. Please try again.
location.unable: Unable to get your location. Please try again.

map.rewardNote: Note: You can access this message again by clicking the rewards icon in the bottom left corner.

validation.latitude_invalid: Latitude must be a valid number
validation.longitude_invalid: Longitude must be a valid number

clear_modal.title: Clear All Circles
clear_modal.message: Are you sure you want to clear all circles? This action cannot be undone.

share_modal.title: Share Circles
share_modal.info: Recipients will be able to view your circles on a read-only map with all coordinates, radius, and inside/outside labels.
share_modal.share_error: You must be logged in to share circles
share_modal.select_friend: Select a friend to share with
share_modal.tip: Share this link with other players so they can view your circles.

rewards.title: Reward Earned
rewards.note: Note: You can access this message again by clicking the rewards icon in the bottom left corner.

map.shared_circle_confirm: Are you sure you want to remove these shared circles from your map?

accessDenied.title: ACCESS DENIED
accessDenied.message: You do not have permission to view this page. Please contact your administrator if you believe this is a mistake.

friends.title: Friends
friends.no_friends: You haven't added any friends yet.

admin.title: Admin Panel
admin.welcomeMessage: Welcome to the admin panel. Use the sidebar to navigate.
admin.canIncludeChars: Can include letters, numbers, or symbols
admin.confirmUpdateMessage: Are you sure you want to update the event code?
admin.eventCodeMinLength: Event code must be at least 4 characters long.

event_code.title: EVENT CODE SETTINGS
event_code.req_content: Can include letters, numbers, or symbols
event_code.confirm_message: Are you sure you want to update the event code?
event_code.error_length: Event code must be at least 4 characters long.

hints.title: Hint Settings
hints.hint_title_need2: Title must be at least 3 characters long
hints.hint_content_need2: Content must be at least 5 characters long

users.title: Delete Users Settings
users.info: Delete all users with role USER
users.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete all users?
users.more_info: This will remove all users with role USER
users.success: âœ… All users with role USER have been deleted.

errors.generic: An error occurred. Please try again.
errors.network: Network error. Please check your connection.
errors.unauthorized: You are not authorized to perform this action.
errors.not_found: The requested resource was not found.
errors.server: Server error. Please try again later.

home.description: A global location-based game where you find hidden circles on maps, complete challenges and compete with your team.
